[Global Namespace]

Global namespace.

Types
ALERT_TYPE
enum ALERT_TYPE {...}

Alert type for console messages

Values
at_notice

(0) Prints 'NOTICE: <message>

at_console

(1) Outputs text to the console only if developer is larger than 0

at_aiconsole

(2) Only shown if developer is 2 or larger

at_warning

(3) Prints 'Warning: <message>

at_error

(4) Prints 'Error: <message>

at_logged

(5) Server print to console (only in multiplayer games)
